importantArticles.headline: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - April 10, 2025) - First Majestic Silver Corp. (NYSE: AG) (TSX: AG) (FSE: FMV) (the "Company" or "First Majestic") is pleased to announce the release of its 2024 Sustainability Report and the mailing of its meeting materials for the Company's upcoming 2025 Annual General Meeting of Shareholders (the "2025 AGM").2024 SUSTAINABILITY REPORTThe Company's 2024 Sustainability Report has been prepared primarily in alignment with the Sustainability Accountin
importantArticles.title: First Majestic Announces 2024 Sustainability Report and Mailing of 2025 AGM Meeting Materials

importantArticles.headline: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - April 9, 2025) - First Majestic Silver Corp. (NYSE: AG) (TSX: AG) (FSE: FMV) (the "Company" or "First Majestic") announces that total production in the first quarter of 2025 from the Company's four producing underground mines in Mexico, namely the Cerro Los Gatos Silver Mine (the Company holds a 70% interest in the Los Gatos Joint Venture that owns the mine), the Santa Elena Silver/Gold Mine, the San Dimas ...
importantArticles.title: First Majestic Produces 7.7 Million AgEq Ounces in Q1 2025 Including a Record 3.7 Million Silver Ounces
